Name: HENTAI SHADOW
About the game: An evil wizard collected the best girls of the world and bewitched them, breaking their souls into small pieces and sharpening them into the most ancient symbols of the language that no one mortal on the earth remembers ... First you have to play with the shadows of the girls' souls to get the pieces of the puzzle then you should collect a girl in fragments and release her .... and all this in a cozy atmosphere with good music In Game: Cute arts Gallery with pictures from the completed levels. Good music Dynamic atmosphere Unusual riddles (based on interaction with shadows) Classic puzzles of varying difficulty Progress Future: Collectible cards. In this project, I put a piece of my soul and I hope that if you multiply it by your community activity, the gods will hear us and I will be able to please you with collectible cards ....
